name: Burg_148
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole influence
folk rituals timed to tides and lunar markers
navigation blends charts with augury rites
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: State affiliation unknown; semi-autonomous practical governance
Small harbor settlement; vulnerable to storms and supply interruptions
